Pre-Game Insights: South Africa opt to bowl against India
The match is a must-win for India as they are trailing 2-1 in the series
South Africa will look to make a comeback in this match and clinch the series
India will need to click as a all-round unit to win the match
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match is being played at Saurashtra Cricket Association Stadium, in Rajkot
The Proteas lost the previous game by 48 runs
South African captain Temba Bavuma made a couple of forced changes due to injuries
Others: Indian captain Rishabh Pant said the team is focusing on their process and not thinking of the match as a must-win
